20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Sulaiman bin Musa narrated that:When Muhammad bin Abi Sufyan was dying, he was greatly distressed and said: "My sister Umm Habibah bint Abi Sufyan said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Whoever maintains four rak'ahs before Zuhr and four after, Allah (SWT) will forbid him from the Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى إِسْمَاعِيلَ بْنِ أَبِي خَالِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: The differences in the reports from Ismail bin Abi Khalid
